messages.subject: SFO Ninja
messages.msgSnippet: Posted on that other list by, someone who has had some bad dealings with Hoshino in SF and who is taking various legal actions to recover his money.  Whilst
messages.messageBody:
Posted on that other list by,
someone who has had some bad dealings with Hoshino in SF and who is
taking various legal actions to recover his money.  Whilst it may not
be appropriate to post his exact email to this list, he is filing a
complaint (amongst other things) with the District Attorney in San
Mateo County - Consumer Fraud office Tel (650) 363-4651. 

He is asking if anyone who has had similar bad dealings of any kind, to
contact him or call the Consumer Fraud Office.
If anyone on this list wishes me to pass on his email to you directly,
please email me PRIVATELY.









[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
